Language.Sentence: The Form list type produces an object displayed as a list. It can be contained only in the Form and Container objects. The data to display must be written in the 'Value' attribute as a dictionary (for example, {"key": "value"}) or a list (for example, ["value1", "value2", "value3"]).
Position in visual hierarchy of objects
Spacing between the top edge of the container and the object in pixels
Spacing between the left edge of the container and the object in pixels
Width of the object in pixels
Height of the object in pixels
Order of rendering the object on the page
String of displayed and posted values in JSON format
Index of selected value in list (from 0)
Index number of switching the elements on pressing the tab key
Define if the object is disabled or not
Incorrect value, must be either 0 or 1
Incorrect value, must be either 0 or 1
Incorrect value, must be even positive integer
Incorrect value, must be even positive integer
Incorrect value, must be even positive integer
Incorrect value, must be even positive integer
Incorrect value, must be even integer from 0 to 99
Incorrect value, must be even positive integer
Incorrect value, must be either 0 or 1
Move the object to a new position
Set new CSS style of the object
Define whether new item is selected or not
Fade effect, time is indicated in milliseconds
X-coordinate of the new position relative to the left upper corner of the container
Y-coordinate of the new position relative to the left upper corner of the container
Visual effect of moving, time is indicated in milliseconds
Value of the item to remove
Fade effect, time is indicated in milliseconds
Define whether to sort or not

Неправильное значение, должен быть указан 0 или 1

Неправильное значение, должно быть указано целое число от 0 до 99
Неправильное значение, должно быть указано целое положительное число

Type.SourceCode: import StringIO, json, collections from collections import OrderedDict class VDOM_formlist(VDOM_object): def get_data (self) : data = {} if self.value: try: data = json.loads(self.value, object_pairs_hook=collections.OrderedDict) debug(data) if isinstance(data, int): raise Exception("value: %s. Incorrect format of data" % self.value) except: raise Exception("value: %s. Incorrect format of data" % self.value) if isinstance(data, dict): data = OrderedDict(data) return data def render(self, parent, contents=""): display = u"display:none;" if self.visible == "0" else u"" style = u"""position: absolute; z-index: {zind}; top: {top}px; left: {left}px; width: {width}px; height: {height}px; {display} font: 14px tahoma """.format(zind = self.zindex, top = self.top, left = self.left, width = self.width, height = self.height, display = display) id = u"o_" + (self.id).replace('-', '_') disabled = u"disabled" if self.disabled == "1" else u"" select = u"""<select {disabled} id="{id}" name="{name}" tabindex="{tabind}" autocomplete="off" style="{style}">"""\ .format(disabled = disabled, id = id, name = self.name, tabind = self.tabindex, style = style) data = self.get_data() res_buffer = StringIO.StringIO(u"") res_buffer.write(select) selected = u"" for (index, value) in zip(xrange(len(data)), data): if isinstance(data, OrderedDict): if value == unicode(self.selectedvalue): selected = u"""selected="yes" """ else: selected = u"" option = u"""<option value="{cur_value}" {selected}>{cur_item}</option>"""\ .format(cur_value = value, selected = selected, cur_item = data[value]) else: try: if index == int(self.selectedvalue): selected = u"""selected="yes" """ else: selected = u"" except: pass option = u"""<option value="{cur_value}" {selected}>{cur_item}</option>"""\ .format(cur_value = value, selected = selected, cur_item = value) res_buffer.write(option) res_buffer.write(u"</select>") result = res_buffer.getvalue() res_buffer.close() return VDOM_object.render(self, parent, contents=result) def get_selected_value (self) : sel_value = "" data = self.get_data() i = -1 first_value = "" for (index, value) in zip(xrange(len(data)), data): i = i + 1 if isinstance(data, OrderedDict): if i==0: first_value = data[value] if value == unicode(self.selectedvalue) : sel_value = data[value] break else: if i==0: first_value = value try: if self.selectedvalue and index == int(self.selectedvalue) : sel_value = value break except: pass if not sel_value: sel_value = first_value return sel_value def wysiwyg(self, parent, contents=""): rect_width = int(self.width)-1 if int(self.width)>1 else int(self.width) rect_height = int(self.height)-1 if int(self.height)>1 else int(self.height) btn_width = 15 if rect_width > 15 else rect_width btn_height = rect_height btn_y = 0 btn_x = rect_width - btn_width - 1 if rect_width > btn_width else 0 triangle_width = 5 if btn_width < triangle_width : triangle_width = btn_width triangle_x = btn_x else : triangle_x = btn_x + (btn_width - triangle_width) / 2 + 1 triangle_height = 4 if btn_height < triangle_height : triangle_height = btn_height triangle_y = 0 else : triangle_y = (btn_height - triangle_height) / 2 color = "#aaaaaa" if self.disabled=="1" else "#000000" btn = \ u"""<svg> <rect x="{btn_x}" y="{btn_y}" width="{btn_width}" height="{btn_height}" fill="#EEEEEE" stroke="{color}"/> <polygon fill="{color}" stroke="{color}" points="{xa},{ya} {xb},{yb} {xc},{yc}"/> </svg> """.format(btn_x = btn_x, btn_y = btn_y, btn_width = btn_width, btn_height = btn_height, xa = triangle_x, ya = triangle_y, xb = triangle_x+triangle_width, yb = triangle_y, xc = triangle_x+triangle_width/2, yc = triangle_y+triangle_height, color = color) result = \ u"""<container id="{id}" visible="{vis}" zindex="{zind}" hierarchy="{hierarchy}" order="{order}" top="{top}" left="{left}" width="{width}" height="{height}"> <svg> <rect y="0" x="0" width="{rect_width}" height="{rect_height}" fill="#FFFFFF" stroke="{color}"/> </svg> <svg> <text x="{text_x}" y="{text_y}" width="{width}" height="{height}" fill="{color}" font-size="14" font-family="tahoma">{value}</text> </svg> {btn} </container> """.format(id = self.id, vis = self.visible, zind = self.zindex, hierarchy = self.hierarchy, order = self.order, top = self.top, left = self.left, width = self.width, height = self.height, rect_width = rect_width, rect_height = rect_height, btn = btn, value = self.get_selected_value(), text_x = 7, text_y = 15 if rect_height < 15 else (rect_height-15)/2+15, color = color) return VDOM_object.wysiwyg(self, parent, contents=result)
